title: Rip Van Winkle by Washington Irving
description: Washington Irving's classic tale Rip Van Winkle, about a man who falls asleep under a tree and awakens 20 years later.What follows is a tale that has become a classic in literature."Rip's sole domestic adherent was his dog Wolf, who was as much hen-pecked as his master; for Dame Van Winkle regarded them as companions in idleness, and even looked upon Wolf with an evil eye, as the cause of his master's going so often astray"
author: Washington Irving
